nodes.text: The Militarists were a minor faction within the Senate of the Galactic Republic prior to the Separatist Crisis. They had little interest in economic issues and focused on restoring a formal, centralized military that could keep the Hutt expansion in check and crush the many pirates and criminal organizations that plagued the galaxy. They often voted with the Core Faction. After the eruption of the Clone Wars, the Militarists allied themselves under the Loyalist Faction.
